cosmos.question: I am big and bright and come out at night, but I'm not always round. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I shine in the dark sky.
🧀 Sometimes I look like cheese.
🐺 Werewolves like me!

cosmos.question: I am very hot and give light to the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I appear during the day.
🔥 Plants need me to grow.
🕶️ You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I am a sparkly ball in the night sky, far, far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I twinkle.
🔭 You can see lots of me with a telescope.
✨ I'm part of a constellation.

cosmos.question: I go around the Sun and you live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I am made of land and water.
🏡 People live here.
🌱 Plants grow here.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that makes light, and the Sun is one of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot.
✨ I shine brightly.
🌌 There are billions of me in the galaxy.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 The Big Dipper is an example.
🌌 Ancient people told stories about me.
✨ You can spot me at night.

cosmos.question: I am a rocky object that orbits the Sun, but I'm much smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🪨 I'm found between Mars and Jupiter.
☄️ Sometimes I fall to earth.
🌑 I am smaller than a planet

cosmos.question: I am a very cold and icy ball that flies around the sun with a long, bright tail. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice and dust.
✨ My tail shines when I get close to the Sun.
☄️ I come from far away in the solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our Sun is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am very, very big.
✨ I contain billions of stars.
💫 We live in the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a place beyond Earth where all the stars, planets, and galaxies are. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 You need a rocket to get there.
🌌 I am very, very big and mysterious.
✨ I am full of stars, planets, and galaxies.

bug.question: I'm a tiny bug that makes yummy honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I live in a hive.
🐝 I buzz around flowers.
💛 I'm yellow and black.

bug.question: I have spots, and I'm red, and I'm lucky, it's said. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I'm small and round.
🪴 Gardeners like me because I eat other bugs!
⚫ I have black dots on my back.

bug.question: I march in a line, carrying leaves all the time. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live underground.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🍫 I can be black or red.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass, and I'm usually green. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I have long legs.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🌱 I like to eat plants.

bug.question: I fly with colorful wings, and I used to be a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I drink nectar from flowers.
🐛 I start as an egg, then a caterpillar, then a pupa!
🎨 I can be many different colors.

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ Some people are afraid of me.
🏠 I live in the corners of houses, or outside.

bug.question: I light up the night with my bright glow. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I am a beetle.
✨ I shine in the dark.
🌙 You see me during the summer.

bug.question: I can bite and make you itch, and I like to drink your blood, which is not very nice. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I fly around your head.
💧 I like wet places.
🥴 My bite leaves a bump.

bug.question: I chew on wood and can damage houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I live inside wooden structures.
🐜 I am like an ant, but I eat wood.
🪵 You might need to call someone to get rid of me.

bug.question: I have a long body, lots of legs, and crawl close to the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have more than 20 legs.
🍃 I like to hide under rocks and leaves.
🌱 I eat dead plants and other bugs.
